name: ELEX

files.goginstaller: N/A:Select the game's setup file from GOG

content:
files:
- goginstaller: N/A:Select the game's setup file from GOG
game:
  arch: win64
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/ELEX/system/ELEX.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: vcrun2010 vcrun2012 win7
    arch: win64
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    description: Installing Elex...
    executable: goginstaller
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
wine:
  dxvk: true
